text: Explain Artifical Intelligence, adopt a humorous and playful tone.
Explain DNA reconstruction, adopt a formal and professional tone.
Describe a sunset in a very dramatic and uplifting way.
Write a product review that is both extremely enthusiastic and somewhat detailed.
Explain quantum physics in a way that is both simple and respectful.
Write a children's story that is both exciting and reassuring.
Compose a tweet that is both professional and informative.
Write a short biography of a famous person that is both deeply admiring and thoroughly factual.
Give advice on public speaking that is both encouraging and cautionary.
Write a movie scene that is both hilarious and dramatic.
Describe a delicious meal in a way that is both appetizing and unusual.
Write a letter of complaint that is both firm and professional.
Tell a joke that is both clever and family-friendly.
Write a news report that is both objective and thoroughly researched.
Create a character description that is both heroic and noble.
Write a poem about love that is both romantic and realistic.
